responses.content:
```yaml
leads:
  - headline: Command injection in generate_contributors_list.sh
    analysis: |
      The script `generate_contributors_list.sh` uses user input in a command without proper sanitization.
      An attacker could craft a malicious commit message containing shell metacharacters to execute arbitrary commands.
    cwe: CWE-77
    function_names: []
    filenames:
      - scripts/generate_contributors_list.sh
    classification: very promising
  - headline: Command injection in linux_test.sh
    analysis: |
      The script `linux_test.sh` passes the output of `docker run` to another shell command without sanitization. 
      If an attacker can control the output of the docker container, they can inject arbitrary commands into the host shell.
    cwe: CWE-77
    function_names: []
    filenames:
      - scripts/linux_test.sh
    classification: slightly promising
```

leads.headline: Command injection in generate_contributors_list.sh
leads.analysis:
The script generate_contributors_list.sh uses user input in a command without proper sanitization.
An attacker could craft a malicious commit message containing shell metacharacters to execute arbitrary commands.

leads.headline: Command injection in linux_test.sh
leads.analysis:
The script linux_test.sh passes the output of docker run to another shell command without sanitization. 
If an attacker can control the output of the docker container, they can inject arbitrary commands into the host shell.
